name: pino-api-logger
author: DiiiaToTe
description: Self-hosted server-side API logger with multi-stream writing (to console and file), daily rotation, buffered writes, and monthly archiving for Node/Bun projects.

scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run build:types && bun run build:compile
scripts.build:compile: bun build src/index.ts src/run-archiver-worker.ts --outdir dist --target node --packages=external
scripts.benchmark: bun run build && bun run tests/benchmark.ts
scripts.benchmark:with-console: bun run build && bun run tests/benchmark.ts --with-console
scripts.npm:prepublish: bun run format && bun run lint && bun run test && bun run clean && bun run build
